text_content_for_rag: On May 18th, Devam's significant locations included 'Home' during the day and 'Law Garden' for a brief walk in the late afternoon.
Devam mentioned working late at the 'Main Office' on May 19th, returning home around 9 PM.
Monika was at the 'Community Center Gym' for an evening class on May 19th until 8:30 PM.
Niketu reported travelling for work on May 20th, staying at 'Airport Hotel XYZ'.
During the day of May 20th, Devam was primarily at 'Home Office'. Evening spent at 'Friend's House' for dinner.
Monika's location on May 20th: 'Local Cafe' for morning work, 'Home' in the afternoon and evening.
Niketu was in 'Client Office - City B' for meetings all day on May 21st.
Maulin spent May 18th mostly at 'Home', with a visit to 'Local Library' in the afternoon.
Siddh was at 'University Campus' for classes on May 19th, then 'Student Dorm' in the evening.
Adit confirmed being on a 'Hiking Trail - Mountain Park' for most of May 20th.
